General.Name: Sequa Petroleum NV
General.Description: Sequa Petroleum N.V., an oil and gas company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, appraisal, development, and production of onshore and offshore oil and gas assets worldwide. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 23 Savile Row, London, United Kingdom, W1S 2ET
